alert.note: Alert for Hooker; Thomas (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 10 at 3:59PM CDT until July 10 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Hooker County in west central Nebraska... Western Thomas County in north central Nebraska... * Until 445 PM CDT/345 PM MDT/. * At 359 PM CDT/259 PM MDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located over Seneca, or 11 miles east of Mullen, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Thedford, Seneca and Norway. This includes the following highways... Highway 2 between mile markers 191 and 210. Highway 83 between mile markers 139 and 148. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
